website_summaries.verdict: Available in youth sizes, these skates combine speed, performance, comfort, and design.
pros: Comfort-fit boot has reinforced heel stabilizer
Padded collar, laces, and hook-and-loop power strap
54- millimeter clear urethane wheels with Pro Core bearings
cons: May run small, so keep this in mind when ordering

customer_reviews.title: Looks greats, but thats all.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these skates when they came. My ten year old son loved it! He would sleep in them if he could. Then one day he was skating in them and the wheel came loose causing him to fall. We tried fixing them and it worked for a short time then broke again. While the skates seem to be great for the price, in actual it really wasn't worth it. They broke in less than two after purchase. They look great but all!!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Khole

customer_reviews.title: Very painful for my kids
customer_reviews.text: The boys said they are very painful on their ankles, I tried to buy ankle gel cushions but it did not work. unfortunately, it took a while before they went skating im a few days out of the return period for this pair. I really wish they'd at least do an exchange of some kind. I am returning the other pair
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful Nerd!

customer_reviews.title: durable -- GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 10 yo son -- he LOVES them, used them a bunch of time; fast, durable -- GREAT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: MAJOR BUYER

customer_reviews.title: Really cool looking, and they seem fairly well made
customer_reviews.text: Really cool looking, and they seem fairly well made. Fairly good padding inside to cushion the feet. They smell odd, however, like so many plastic products that come from China.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Truthfinder

customer_reviews.title: He loved them so much that when he grew out of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates for my son a couple years ago. He loved them so much that when he grew out of them I bought him another pair. He uses them to skate around the house and at the roller rink.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Apparently the material is not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Skates damaged from the first day of use. I imagined this happening over time but not the very first day.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Roberts

customer_reviews.title: The wheels are the issue. Using my hand to ...
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are the issue. Using my hand to test how freely they spin, they don't continue spinning after I've swiped them to test them. I can imagine they would wear someone out trying to push themselves to skate in them.
customer_reviews.author: LKOKGO

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old Grandson loves the height of the ankle on the skates as well. He wears a size 6 1/2 shoe, but I purchased them in size 8 to give him room to grow into.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Boys rollerskates
customer_reviews.text: Grandson gift for Christmas this year. Not sure if he’s used them yet considering he lives in Florida and I live in Alabama. Very nice looking skates.
customer_reviews.author: Barbbe

customer_reviews.title: roll good and seem like a solid skate
customer_reviews.text: my son loves these skates, They are well built, roll good and seem like a solid skate. I would for sure buy them again
customer_reviews.author: jeff williams

customer_reviews.title: Smooth rolling
customer_reviews.text: I bought my kids three different skates, these were our favorites. They roll faster and longer and smoother. Now all my kids want a pair like this.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: nice skates great price i wear a womens size 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: nice skates great price i wear a womens size 8 ordered boys size 6 and fit perfect. The girls ones were not as cool colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my 7 year old son for his birthday. HE LOVES THEM!! We go roller skating every couple of weeks. A great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: need 1 size more than a normal shoe size
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are great looking and perfectly fit . you need to take 1 size more compared to your regular shoe size. My son is enjoying.
customer_reviews.author: Chandu

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Nephew loves them. Can’t pick color of skates. I ordered black ones but received white skates.
customer_reviews.author: brenna boman

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to choose a No Star Rating but was forced to choose 1 Star - We purchased these skates and had to return due to a defect with the skate stopper. The item was replaced-we once again have the same issue with the replaced item. We would like to return the replacement and purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Nephew love his skates. His right one rubs his ankle. But we wrap it. So he's good.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Sized appropriately, sturdy and nice looking gear that is being well-used!
customer_reviews.author: Inspired

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent beginners skate. The size is true. My grandson loves them.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these roller skates for my Grandsons and he was super excited! E loves to skate and now I can't keep him out of the rink! I gave it a 5 star rating because it is sturdy and is true to size. I would recommend these skates to anyone looking to buy a pair for their sons or grandsons.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Fensom

customer_reviews.title: Value and quality
customer_reviews.text: This produst is awesome. My son couldnt skate that well when he got them. Soon after he was jumping and turning tricks. He was able to keep up with everyone and this product lasted a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and after 10 visits to the rink they will have paid for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: L. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 8 year old son. He loves them. Very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Susan N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very well made... My son loves tgese even after all the times he has fell they have held up very well
customer_reviews.author: Ryann Korb

customer_reviews.title: He loves to skate and these were very well made and a good price. Very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was tickled pink to get these. He loves to skate and these were very well made and a good price. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: laney

customer_reviews.title: Great roller skates!!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves these skates & has a ball skating on the cement walkways. Very happy with purchase & Amazon delivered very fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Dona

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: these were for my daughter alot space came in the right size and also great being used by kids theres no scratches or tears in these skates
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: are sturdy and provide tons of outdoor fun for him
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 10 y.o. son. They fit well, are sturdy and provide tons of outdoor fun for him.
customer_reviews.author: Bookishly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great skates! The kiddo has been having a wonderful time. The skates are made well, they’re tough, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: NICE LOOKING COMFORTABLE SKATE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a beginning! It's a nice skate, comfortable and true to fit, glides nicely but easy to wear. Black toe area started to peel and fade after one use.
customer_reviews.author: rachael w.

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these skates! He's brand new to roller skating, and they seem to offer plenty of ankle support. We plan to stick with this brand when he outgrows this pair!
customer_reviews.author: R. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: these are great. Don't buy if you are an adult trying ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're a kid, these are great. Don't buy if you are an adult trying derby out. You need actual roller derby skates! R3s at a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for new learner
customer_reviews.text: Our son has had these in every day since we got them. They are durable and work well in pavement too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL for first time 10 yr old boys.
customer_reviews.text: Great for 10 year old boys with size 5 who are just learning to skate. Wheels can be changed to go slow or fast.. WONDERFUL!! Colors are great in the dark neon glowing skating rink!
customer_reviews.author: J. Baehre

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice skates, my son loves them. Only issue is one of the wheels fell off within a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blisters no more!
customer_reviews.text: Renting skates at the rink....NO MORE! My son loves these and we got them a size bigger so he can grow into them, but it wasn't an issue. These are sturdy and durable. A great purchase indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Sewing Fool

customer_reviews.title: More than I was Expecting for the Price!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my nephew and he LOVES them! They were more than I was expecting and look awesome. After comparing A TON of different skates at a variety of different places and prices, I figured these would be a little bit of a compromise between price and product. They definitely seem comparable to the more expensive skates I was looking at! High quality and holding up well, despite multiple crash and burns :)
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: Roller Derby Speed Quad Skate
customer_reviews.text: Grandson LOVES these skates!! Was impressed that they were Roller Derby & wanted to skate to school the next day (dad told him no -- he would've been exhausted!!) Great skates for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Page

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son loves these, they fit well and are true to size
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R.

customer_reviews.title: Well built.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my son perfectly. He loves the color and they are good for indoor skating.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: They didn't last forever but served the purpose! Son had fun!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates
customer_reviews.text: My son is a beginner at Rolker skating. He got these at Christmas and had used them 4 times so far at the rink and he absolutely loves them. Loves the color and he is skating around so much better than with the rentals. Great buy. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jrq

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: True to size and goid for indoor use at skating rink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... skates for my grandson's 9th birthday and they where awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates for my grandson's 9th birthday and they where awesome!
customer_reviews.author: anna lou lee

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: They r what and blue instead of green and black :(
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my cousin and he really loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: They roll nicely and the child they were purchased for loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He skated longer and faster
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my eight year old grandson. He zoomed around the rink and had lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bearings in wheels came out 2 time my son used
customer_reviews.author: adam hooten

customer_reviews.title: Cool skates.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these skates. He did not want inline skates so he picked the 4 wheels. They look cool so he doesn't feel like he's wearing baby skates. He's 8 and is just learning to skate.
customer_reviews.author: Somshine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates for my son for Christmas. He loves them!! He's only had the opportunity to use them twice but so far so good!! Many people have commented on how nice they look. They are comfortable for him and the sizing is right. I would, and have, recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: tiaandlevismom

customer_reviews.title: Quality Skates
customer_reviews.text: Great Skates! I bought these for my grandson and he loves them. Good quality and fair price. I would buy these in a larger size when he outgrows this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Hunni

customer_reviews.title: Great skate
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 8yr old son. He loves having his own skates. At first he said they wouldn't roll so we loosened the wheels a bit and now he does just fine in them. Skating is new to him so these were great investment at a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels great just trying them on but haven't actually used them yet
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: First pair
customer_reviews.text: My son’s first pair of skates and he looks them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. Buy a size bigger and add an ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. Buy a size bigger and add an extra pair of socks, if need be. It will save you from having to buy a new pair of skates in the short term, since kids feet grow so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent RollerSkates for Everyone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes it did - maybe surpassed expectation, because my 10 year old son wants to keep it on all the time. I am buying myself a pair as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SKATES
customer_reviews.text: Skates looked GREAT , but do order a size bigger than shoe size , they do run small . My grandson loved them , he wears them all over the house and takes them skating .
customer_reviews.author: anita schofield

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids loved them. Just what they needed, study yet stylish, they loved them and all their friends were jealous and mom's wanted to know where I got them!
customer_reviews.author: tricia smith

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy! Skates are awesome and my boy loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen G.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: These skates were delivered fast and my nephew loves them. His younger brother and sister skate around the house in them too. The are well made and just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for the roller rink
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son loves his skates. The velcro straps make them easy for him to put on and they hold the laces in place.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore

customer_reviews.title: AWE-SOME!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very cool looking. Amazing price. Bought them big for my growing 11 yo boy but even still they stay on great.
customer_reviews.author: 5hungrybookworms

customer_reviews.title: Like new!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent condition. Don't appear to have ever been used. Wonderfully packaged. Work well. Good fro beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Book Hippie

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great skates for the price! My son loves to skate so we suprised him with a pair of these. He is in love and has been using them everyday since! He says their smooth,comfortable, and of course fast! It was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: nichole marie cerny

customer_reviews.title: Roller Derby Speed Quad
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Skate for the price. Ordered boys 6 for a size 6 and fit great. Seem to be holding up thus far.
customer_reviews.author: IbeJane

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old has had hours of fun in these. Nice style. Easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves them...could not get them off his feet for weeks. Worth the money, holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie707

customer_reviews.title: Cute Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his skates. They are really cute and fit very well. He has a wide foot, but they still go on easily. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deb from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: great skates!
customer_reviews.text: excellent skates worth the money. Got 2 sizes bigger perfect fit with a little room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: maureen stepp

customer_reviews.title: No speed with these skates
customer_reviews.text: These skates were purchased for a experienced skater (11 Boy). They are advertised as "Speed Quad Skate"/ This is very misleading. The wheels do not spin freely nor can you gain speed when in use. They may be appropriate for beginner skaters. We have tried loosening the wheels without achieving the desired results. The only option would be to replace ball bearings in the wheels and I am unsure where to find them. I no longer have the original box or I would return them. IF anyone has a solution I would appreciate hearing about it.
customer_reviews.author: Inge D.

customer_reviews.title: good quality - youth size
customer_reviews.text: I have an 9-year old son with a large foot (size 5)...these fit perfectly, I heard skates run "small" so I was worried they'd be too tight but they fit perfectly...they are good quality skates (not those plastic cheap wheels, these are rubber and great traction on gravel).
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne R.

customer_reviews.title: good skates
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these skates 5 stars but the fit was off. My daughter wears a child size 2. We ordered a size 4 skate. It fits, but with no room to grow. I had to return the other pair I bought for my other daughter because of fit. I would HIGHLY recommend you research shoe to skate conversion charts before you buy. The quality is good and my daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kordek

customer_reviews.title: skating fun
customer_reviews.text: These we're just what I was looking for.My grandson will love them.They look just like the picture and appear to be well make for the money.
customer_reviews.author: kansas s

customer_reviews.title: Plastic wheels don't roll
customer_reviews.text: Warning: There are TOY skates and not suitable if you want your child to learn to skate properly. The wheels are plastic and do not roll right. I was very disappointed when my son's skating instructor told me he would have a lot of difficulty learning to skate in them. I was a bit shocked since they do look very nice and I read tons of positive reviews online. Bottom line is my 7 year old son is learning to skate at a roller rink and these are definitely NOT the proper skates for him so I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela J. Frame

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! Awesome kids skate, bright colors and smooth wheels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: grandsons gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson, he loves them, at the roller rink all the time. Nice colors, smooth ride. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: sharrona

customer_reviews.title: Nice, quality skate!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of this brand/type of skates that I've purchased. When my kids outgrow them I get the same kind because they've been so great!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda W.

customer_reviews.title: Good value and stylish
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! They are well made and were reasonably priced. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna E

customer_reviews.title: Great my grandson loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson who is just learning to skate. Great my grandson loves them. Nice starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie_

customer_reviews.title: Decent skates
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 11 yr old daughter who is fairly accomplished skater. Didn't want to spend a lot of money on skates till her feet stop growing. Sizing fit feel and quality wise they are very good for the price. However plan on replacing the bearings ASAP. Very gritty and slow. They work and all and she didn't even complain about them but when I changed them out to bones reds she noticed a world of difference.
customer_reviews.author: Robnice709

customer_reviews.title: Good quality skates so far
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son and they were delivered the next day! Good quality skates so far.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: My Son is Loving These
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for my 8 year old son. Three siblings also received skates. They use them on the basketball court in our back yard, sidewalks all around our house, and on the asphalt blacktop at the school near our house. These were a great investment considering all the exercise they are getting. The work well despite debris that may be on the sidewalks, roads, or black tops.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Kasch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son Loved them soooooo much easy to put on and off. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca E Bader

customer_reviews.title: Great Price , Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a great outdoors thing to buy for the kids and found these online and said this is just so cool looking , all my kids favorite colors are on one item . I would recomend this for anyone , we went skating for New Years Eve and it was fun.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: He says they are comfortable and fast
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these skates for my Grandson for Christmas. He loves them. He says they are comfortable and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Woods

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old Loves Them!!
customer_reviews.text: They are cool. I bought a size 6 so my son can grow into them over the summer. He wears a size 5 now. They are perfect for outside too.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Love

customer_reviews.title: but once on they are great.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves these skates. they are a bit difficult to get on because they are very stiff at the ankle, but once on they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Boy's Roller Skates
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Product matched exactly what we saw pictured on line. We were tired of renting skates, Now my son has his own pair.
customer_reviews.author: GDR

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: I got these skates for my son's 7th birthday. He loves them they fit well not snug. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We bought another brand of skates and they broke within six weeks without frequent or hard use. Also, harder to put on and adjust. These are great and the wheels are much tougher so keep the ride smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Cure

customer_reviews.title: We love them. Had the skate rink guy loosen the ...
customer_reviews.text: We love them. Had the skate rink guy loosen the wheels, the skates seem wonderful, my boy wears them for many hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Norma R

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for 11 year old boy, brand new at skating.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11 year old godson who never really roller skated before. He wanted to learn, but didn't want little kid skates or to rent the ones at the rink. These were amazing quality for the price. I was able to loosen the wheels a bit so that it actually rolled. Nice bearings too. He will probably be able to wear these until he is proficient and then I am sure will want something with a bit more speed. Totally satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I would certainly recommend these skates. My son, absolutely loves them. He has been to the skating rink many times and has has no problems. They are also very easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: LouisvilleMom

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my 10 year old grandson for Christmas and he loved them. It has only been a few days but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia D. Wetterling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice roller skates, bought them to teach my 7 year old how to skate.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri R Blair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great. Awesome price and quality for a growing 8 year old boy!!
customer_reviews.author: LaPearle Bolden

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these skates for our 11 yr. old son who's been skating with his sisters old white skates in our cul-de-sac. These seem like a really good product and I'm sure he'll get a lot of use out of them once the weather warms up!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish design and smooth-rolling wheels
customer_reviews.text: No special adjustments were necessary - these roll great right out of the box. Fits true to size - we bought a size large to extend the life and just use thick socks. 7-year old loved these at first sight.
customer_reviews.author: A new mom

customer_reviews.title: Mike
customer_reviews.text: I sort of bought this as a Christmas present for my sisters children last year, they work fine and the kids enjoy them :) they are durable and reliable great buy
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: Roller Derby Boy's Laser Speed Quad Skate
product_meta.description: Perfect for those who love to skate, the Roller Derby Laser 7.9 Boy's Speed Roller Skate offers performance and comfort in a speed skate design.
feature_bullets: Boot: Reinforced comfort fit boot with heel stabilizer, padded collar, and laces & Velcro power strap
Wheels: 54mm Clear Urethane with Pro Core
